data.title: Savannah's Event & Networking Guide
data.meta_description: Savannah Georgia's Event & Networking Guide! Featuring real-time up to the minute events in the hostess city of the south!
data.text:
If you’re an experienced prime contractor, looking to open doors to ‘other agencies’ with your expertise; or a new business, seeking to gain experience in contracting, ‘Don’t miss this opportunity!

Plug-In & Learn: The Art of Teaming and Sub-Contracting to WIN!!!

✓ Subcontracting and Teaming

✓ Joint Ventures

✓ Mentor Protégé’ Program

This training course is designed to show you ‘how to’ work the system and get Smart Wins!!!

Get excited and join us for Savannah’s most diverse networking event series, Sips at the Station, as we spotlight a rotation of nonprofits each month. Hosted by Ardsley Station, Savannah Master Calendar, and Simply Savannah Marketing, admission is a $10 donation and includes a complimentary beverage from Ardsley Station’s special bar menu and an assortment of unique, off-menu, hors d’oeuvres, all while enjoying live music. Raffle tickets are also available for purchase, and 100% of proceeds from admission and raffle sales go to the month’s chosen nonprofit.

___

We are excited to announce July 16th’s event will benefit Step Up Savannah. Step Up Savannah is a 501(c)3 organization aimed at promoting economic opportunity and financial security in Chatham County, GA.

The organization acts as a convener, attracts outside resources, adapts and creates effective programs and products, trains neighborhood and nonprofit leaders, and advocates for policies that will improve the lives of low-income families. Step Up Savannah seeks out lasting solutions that enable low-income families to work toward economic self-sufficiency.

January – Heads-Up Guidance Services

February – Coastal Pet Rescue

March – Make-A-Wish

April – Gilliard & Company

May – Alzheimer’s Association’s Dancing Stars

June – Heroes for Hallie Grace

July – Step Up Savannah

August – TBD

September – TBD

October – TBD

November – TBD

Thank you also to our longtime sponsors and supporters – Creature Comforts Brewing, Tito’s Vodka, and Woodinville Whiskey, as well as all of those who have continued to make this event such a success!

Victoria Baylor will delve into the strategic art of networking, showcasing how it can play a pivotal role in expanding your professional horizons, enriching your knowledge base, and ultimately increasing your net worth. Whether you’re an aspiring entrepreneur, a seasoned professional, or anyone eager to unlock new opportunities, this session is tailored to equip you with actionable insights to navigate the modern networking landscape.

Victoria Baylor, CODC, CNLP, CPC, is a Certified Leadership Mindset Coach, Organizational Development Consultant, TEDx speaker, and keynote speaker. She has been an entrepreneur and researcher for 16 years and is the founder of Victoria Baylor Leadership and OD Solutions. She understands the challenges that leaders often face and offers empowering coaching that helps them elevate their leadership strengths, overcome mindset blocks (like fear, confidence issues, imposter syndrome, etc.), and activate their full potential.

Key Topics to be Covered:

The Evolution of Networking: Understand how networking has evolved in the digital age and why it’s crucial for your career and financial growth.

Building Meaningful Connections: Learn strategies for forming authentic connections that go beyond business cards and LinkedIn profiles.

Leveraging Online Platforms: Discover how to effectively utilize online platforms and social media to expand your network and visibility.

Networking with Purpose: Learn to identify and engage with individuals who align with your goals, fostering mutually beneficial relationships.

The Power of Collaboration: Understand how collaborative efforts and partnerships can lead to increased opportunities and financial gains.

Effective Communication: Enhance your communication skills to make lasting impressions and convey your value proposition confidently.

Networking’s Impact on Net Worth: Gain insights into real-life success stories where networking directly contributed to financial growth and professional advancement.

Personal Branding: Explore how personal branding enhances your network’s perception of your expertise and value.

Navigating Networking Events: Get tips on making the most of networking events, conferences, and industry meet-ups.

Long-Term Networking Strategies: Learn how to cultivate and nurture relationships over time for sustained benefits.

Who Should Attend: Professionals, entrepreneurs, students, and anyone seeking to harness the power of networking to enhance their career prospects and financial success.
